title: Berserk gjennom Nordvestpassasjen
overview: Jarle Andh√∏y, known from his many Berserk expeditions, gathers here a group of "dented" sons of Norway, to honor his polar heroes. The crew has minimal sailing experience where they muster in Puerto Rico. Berserk is set up by a group that would rather party than work, but slowly but surely the ship is finally seaworthy. The gang sets off on a voyage that surpasses previous expeditions in the North. In a bloodless Viking raid, our modern heroes are pursued by Canadian Coast Guard ships, defense and police in this incredible voyage...
